titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to reinstate the tax on interest received by foreigners on certain portfolio investments.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means
House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 1/4/1995--Introduced. Repeals Internal Revenue Code provisions that permit an income tax exemption for interest earned on certain portfolio debt investments and received from U.S. sources by nonresident alien individuals and foreign corporations. Requires tax withholding in connection with such income.
